definition: flat piece of wood/wood chip/CL:塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: A physical spline is a thin piece of wood or other flexible material.
sentences.chinese: 物理样条是一块薄木片或其他有弹性的物质。

sentences.english: The paper studies on the effect of impressafining on absorbability of wood chips.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了挤压疏解作用对木片吸收性的影响。

sentences.english: It was only the cross piece that was carried by the prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 只是单单用来钉挂囚犯的十字形木片椴。

sentences.english: He was chopping wood into small, short pieces for burning.
sentences.chinese: 他将木头砍成小而短的木片，作为烧火之用。

sentences.english: I had a man once send me a chip of wood that showed the marks of a beaver's teeth.
sentences.chinese: 曾经有人送我一段木片，上面有山狸的齿痕。

sentences.english: They carved a whole page of characters back-to-front in the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他们把整页的文字反刻在木片上。

sentences.english: Build the frame of the kite by making a small cross of two pieces of light wood.
sentences.chinese: 把两个小木片扎成十字型，这样就做成了风筝的骨架。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
